item.title: 7 Must-Read YA Books by Latine Authors
item.description: These YA books by Latina authors cover a range of genres: a contemporary mystery, a historical romance, a swashbuckling fantasy, and more.

item.title: 6 Romantic YA Dystopian Books that Prove Love at the End of the World is Possible
item.description: These romantic YA dystopian novels prove that love really can persevere, even when everything else comes crashing down.

item.title: 6 Comics and Graphic Novels for Fans of Studio Ghibli films
item.description: However you like your Studio Ghibli movies, you’re sure to find a comic or graphic novel in this collection that appeals to you.

item.title: Fall in Love With February’s New Mystery, Thriller & True Crime Books
item.description: Whether you're into true crime memoirs or procedurals, there's something for you in February's new releases.

item.title: Native Hawaiian Voices in YA and Adult Books Are Growing in 2026
item.description: 2026 is bringing more Native Hawaiian voices to both young adult and adult fiction shelves.
